description: This file defines the interface and class declaration for a LocalStore component that handles database operations such as opening a connection, creating tables, managing entries, and retrieving data. It provides the class `LocalStore` implementing the `ILocalStore` interface within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class providing methods to manage local database storage, including opening connections, creating tables, adding and removing entries, and querying data.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a database connection to the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
